CrowdsaleExt.getState (/unique_chucks/17/0x7a30683e25c98cf6cf3306b2c41b743cb96c02c4.sol#900-913) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/17/0x7a30683e25c98cf6cf3306b2c41b743cb96c02c4.sol#911-913)
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/17/0x7a30683e25c98cf6cf3306b2c41b743cb96c02c4.sol#912-913)
